org.dhbw.geo.services

Class ConditionService

  • java.lang.Object
    • IntentService
      • org.dhbw.geo.services.ConditionService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.android.gms.common.api.GoogleApiClient.ConnectionCallbacks, com.google.android.gms.common.api.GoogleApiClient.OnConnectionFailedListener, com.google.android.gms.common.api.ResultCallback<com.google.android.gms.common.api.Status>

    public class ConditionService
extends IntentService
implements com.google.android.gms.common.api.GoogleApiClient.ConnectionCallbacks, com.google.android.gms.common.api.GoogleApiClient.OnConnectionFailedListener, com.google.android.gms.common.api.ResultCallback<com.google.android.gms.common.api.Status>
    Handles conditions and sets conditions on startup.
    Author:
    Matthias
